values: How Not to Blaspheme God in the PulpitHow Not to Blaspheme God in the Pulpit

To preach the Bible faithfully is to herald the incomparable supremacy of God and the riches of his glory over everything else the world has to offer.To preach the Bible faithfully is to herald the incomparable supremacy of God and the riches of his glory over everything else the world has to offer.
